code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import apiClient from"../api/apiClient";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function FraudAlerts(){const[alerts,setAlerts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const load=async()=>{const res=await apiClient.get("/admin/fraud-alerts");setAlerts(res.data);};load();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold mb-6",children:"\u26A0\uFE0F Fraud Detection Alerts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{className:"bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-700 dark:text-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-2",children:"Publisher"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-2",children:"Issue"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-2",children:"Value"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-2",children:"Time"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tbody",{children:[alerts.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{colSpan:"4",className:"text-center p-4",children:"\u2705 No Issues Found"})}),alerts.map((a,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"border-t border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-2",children:a.publisher}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-2 text-red-500 font-semibold",children:a.issue}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-2",children:a.value}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-2 text-sm",children:a.time})]},i))]})]})]});}
